artist: Author: Jean-Antoine Lebrun-Tossa; Publisher: François Buisson
creditline:
The Minnich Collection
The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund, 1966
description: Fashion periodical in blue paper covers bound with a folded hand-colored engraving of two women in fashionable dress and a folded black and white engraving of a music sheet with the score ('Air du bonnes gens' by Pierre Gaveaux/Cousin Jacques (Louis Abel Beffroy de Reigny)) on the recto and verso
medium: Hand-colored engraving; engraved musical score; letterpress
portfolio: From Journal de la Mode et du Goût, ou amusemens du salon et de la toilette, Paris, 1790–92
title: Journal de la Mode et du Goût, Seconde Année, Trente-deuxième Cahier, 5 Janvier 1792
